onReceive(android.content.Context, andro.FullName: public void onReceive (Context context, Intent intent)

ClassDesc: A dummy BroadcastReceiver used with an IntentFilter specifying action @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#ACTION_ENABLE_WALLET_OPTIMIZATION_E@ to signal that your application uses Wallet. See @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#WalletConstants#ACTION_ENABLE_WALLET_OPTIMIZATION_E@ for details of using it.
